showScoreExcerpt:
"If one can get past the convoluted and confusing narrative, 'Travesties' has a lot going for it, including exquisite performances from a gifted ensemble...and Stoppardâ€™s witty, crisp, erudite dialogue...Making sense of everything, from the dialogue to the rambling narrative, can be a chore, and Act II does not flow as easily as Act I. Fortunately Patrick Marber directs the cast with breezy precision and gets entertaining, jaunty performances from the actors."
